about.title: about me
about.name: Name:
about.subtitle: SUMMARY
about.text: I am a self-taught front-end developer. In addition to my knowledge base, I actively seek everyday to develop more. I can say that everything what I know about programming is the result of my hard work.
about.text2: Currently my goal is to become more proficient in this field and forge my career as front-end developer.
